Posts.EditableText:
Hey folks, when I try to "untie" Items that are not "untie able" I get this strange default reply:
```
> untie cushions

false attach that to anything.
```
Steve
Posts.HTML:
Hey folks, when I try to "untie" Items that are not "untie able" I get this strange default reply:

> untie cushions

false attach that to anything.

Steve

Posts.EditableText:
Oops, it needs a "char" entry in the message. In about eight places...

I have uploaded a new version of `lib\_commands.js` to GitHub that should correct it.
